            possible values: [Default, Enabled, Disabled]

interpolationMode.description:
The way in which the data should be interpolated.
            Possible values: [Default, StairStep, Continuous].

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.AnalyticSet.NewAn.description: Encapsulates the data for the creation of a new analytic collection.

name.description: The name of the AnalyticCollection

description.description: An optional description of the AnalyticCollection

items.description: An array of the analytics contained in the AnalyticCollection

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.AnalyticSet.Analy.description: Encapsulates the results of a successfully created analytic collection.

name.description: The name of the AnalyticCollection

groupId.description: The group identifier of the AnalyticCollection

location.description: The full URL of the newly created AnalyticCollection

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Asset.Fleet.description:
Represents a 'Fleet' in the EMS system.
            A fleet in this sense is a group of aircraft using the same configuration.
            There may be several fleets representing a particular model of aircraft, each showing a specific configuration
            of the airframe.

id.description: The identifier of the fleet within the system.

description.description: The description for this fleet.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Asset.Aircraft.description: An aircraft in the system refers to an airframe with a particular tail number.

id.description: The identifier of the aircraft within the system

description.description: The description for this aircraft

fleetIds.description:
Each aircraft can be mapped to 0-N fleets in the system. 
            Because a fleet represents a configuration for a airframe and those configurations can change over time,
            it stands to reason that each aircraft can be mapped to more than one of them

isActive.description: Whether this aircraft is active in the system

isApproved.description: Whether this aircraft has been approved

fdwEnabled.description: Whether this aircraft is enabled for FDW or not

odwEnabled.description: Whether this aircraft is enabled for ODW or not

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Asset.FlightPhase.description:
A flight phase is a coarse division of a flight into sections, such as takeoff, climb and enroute.
            The flight phases are used as inputs into some analytics.

id.description: The identifier of the flight phase within the system.

description.description: The description for this phase of flight.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Asset.Airport.description: Encapsulates the definition of an airport.

id.description: The identifier of the airport within the system.

codeIata.description: The IATA code associated with this airport.

codeIcao.description: The ICAO code associated with this airport.

codeFaa.description: The FAA / Regional code associated with this airport.

codePreferred.description: The preferred code to use for display. This is typically either the ICAO or FAA code, but can be overridden by the user.

name.description: The name of the airport.

elevation.description: The elevation of the airport, in feet.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.DatabaseGr.description: Represents a folder in the database tree of an EMS installation.

id.description: The unique string identifier for the database group

name.description: The display name for the database group

groups.description: An ordered listing of child database groups contained in this group

databases.description: An ordered listing of child databases contained in this group

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.Database.description: Represents a database type exposed by an EMS installation.

id.description: The unique string identifier for the database

pluralName.description: A plural display name for the database

singularName.description: A singular display name for the database

primaryKeyFields.description: The list of primary key fields for the database

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.PrimaryKey.description: Represents a primary key field for a database type exposed by an EMS installation.

id.description: The unique string identifier for the primary key

suggestedColumnName.description: Suggested name for the primary key field when stored in a column format (if any)

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.FieldGroup.description: Represents a folder in the data source tree of an EMS installation.

id.description: The unique string identifier for the field group

name.description: The display name for the field group

groups.description: An ordered list of child groups contained in a field group

path.description:
An ordered list of groupIds that make up the path to this group, excluding the root group. 
            The last groupId is the parent group of this group

displayPath.description:
An ordered list of group names that make up the path to this group, excluding the root group.
            The last entry is the parent group of this group

fields.description: An ordered list of child fields contained in a field group

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.Field.description: Represents an individual field that can be accessed within a data source.

id.description: The unique string identifier for the field

type.description: The data type of the underlying data stored for the field

name.description: The display name for the field

path.description:
An ordered list of groupIds that make up the path to this field, excluding the root group.
            The last groupId is the parent group of this field

displayPath.description:
An ordered list of group names that make up the path to this field, excluding the root group.
            The last entry is the parent group of this field

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.FieldInfoQ.description: Represents the body for a request to get information about multiple database fields.

fieldIds.description: The list of database field ids to return information for

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.FieldInfo.description: Represents the result of a query to retrieve info for multiple fields.

fields.description: Information about the available fields that were requested in the query

invalidFieldIds.description: The ids for fields that were requested in the query but are unavailable.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.Query.description: Represents the options used to make up a data source query.

select.description: An array specifying the fields to select and return as columns in the query results

groupBy.description:
An array specifying the fields by which to group aggregate operations. If not specified, no grouping
            is performed

orderBy.description:
An array specifying the selected columns by which to order result rows. Results are always ordered by the
            results value, not by the display formatted value (configured to be returned by the format property). If
            not specified, results are returned in default database ordering

filter.description: A filter used to narrow the query results

tracking.description:
Additional options that may be provided to enable querying for only new or updated data. If not specified
            no special tracking will be performed for the query and all records matching the filter criteria will be
            returned

format.description:
Value formatting that should be performed on results values before returning. If not specified, no results
            formatting is performed. This can be overridden by specifying a value for the Format property of a SelectColumn

distinct.description: Whether to remove duplicate rows from query results before formatting the results. Using a format value other than 'none' can reduce results precision, leading to cases where two distinct rows appear equivalent after formatting is applied. Defaults to false if not specified

top.description:
Identifies a subset of rows to return.
            The subset is formed by selecting only the first N rows of the set, where N is a positive integer provided 
            as the value of this property. If not specified, all rows are returned

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.SelectColu.description: Represents a column of data that can be selected in a data source query.

fieldId.description: The unique string identifier of the field to select in a query

aggregate.description:
An optional aggregate operation to perform on the column. Omission of this property results in no aggregate 
            operation being performed

format.description:
Value formatting that should be performed on this field's value before returning.
            This will override the query's display value

alias.description:
An optional name to use to represent this this column of data (vs the default display 
            name of the field)

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.GroupByCol.description: Represents a column of data that can be used in a group-by clause of a data source query.

fieldId.description: The unique string identifier of the field to use in a group-by clause of a query

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.OrderByCol.description: Represents a column of data that can be used in a order-by clause of a data source query.

fieldId.description: The unique string identifier of the field to use in a order-by clause of a query

aggregate.description:
An optional aggregate operation to perform on the column. Omission of this property results in no aggregate 
            operation being used in the ordering

order.description: The ordering behavior to use for the column values. The omission of this property results in ascending order

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.Filter.description: Represents the operations and arguments that can be used to filter a data source query.

operator.description: The unique string identifier of the operation to perform

args.description:
An ordered list of arguments to provide the operator. The requirements for the arguments depend on which 
            operation is being performed

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.QueryTrack.description: Additional options that may be provided as part of a data source query to enable querying for only new or updated data.

name.description:
A unique name for the tracked query to be used across multiple API calls. This must be a globally
            unique string that should not conflict with other tracked queries

batchId.description:
An optional unique id (guid) to associate with this particular instance of the tracked query. If this 
            is not specified a new batch id will be automatically generated by the API. The batch id is returned
            as part of the query results and may be used to roll back individual queries

mode.description:
An optional mode that specifies which types of records should be returned as part of the tracked query.
            The omission of this property results in the query returning only new records since the last time the
            tracked query was performed

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.FilterArgu.description: Represents an argument in a filter.

type.description: The type of the filter argument, describing the role of the argument.

value.description: The value represented by the filter argument.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.QueryResul.description: Represents the tabular results of a data source query.

header.description:
An ordered list of header column information, describing the fields included in the results and matching 
            the order of columns in the resulting data rows

rows.description:
An array of arrays representing the resulting data rows of a query. Each inner array represents a single 
            results row

isPartialResult.description:
Indicates whether the rows returned are a partial query result because the maximum amount of rows that can 
            be returned has been reached

trackingBatchId.description:
If query tracking options were specified as part of the query, this is the batch id that may be used to roll
            back tracking after query results have been returned

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.QueryResul.description: Represents a header column in data source query result.

id.description: The unique string identifier of the field associated with this column

name.description: The user-friendly display name of the field associated with this column

format.description: The format applied to the values for the field associated with this column

units.description: The units of values of the field associated with this column. This value may be empty if not applicable

aggregate.description: The aggregate operation performed on this column. This value may be empty if not applicable

originalId.description:
The unique string identifier of the field associated with this column as defined in the original request.
            This is only set when the query is altered due to the fieldId used in order to match the database queried against

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.AsyncQuery.description:
Passed back to the client when an async query is started. This contains query header
            information, and a unique ID, with which the user can later read data for this query.

id.description: The ID of the query; this will be used when making subsequent calls to the query APIs.

inactivityTimeout.description: The number of seconds of inactivity after which an async query is eligible for automatic deletion.

header.description:
An ordered list of header column information, describing the fields included in the results and matching 
            the order of columns in the resulting data rows.

trackingBatchId.description:
If query tracking options were specified as part of the query, this is the batch id that may be used to roll
            back tracking after query results have been returned

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.AsyncQuery.description: Represents the tabular results of a data source query obtained from an async query.

rows.description: An array of arrays representing the resulting data rows of a query. Each inner array represents a single results row

hasMoreRows.description: Whether the query has one or more rows in its result set at an index greater than the last row returned

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.Create.description: Represents the options used to make up a data entity creation.

createColumns.description: An array specifying the fields to set during the creation (and their values). This should always include primary key fields.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.Column.description: Represents a column to be modified.

fieldId.description: The unique string identifier of the field to modify.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.CreateResu.description: Represents the result of a create.

rowsAdded.description: The number of rows added by the creation.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.Insert.description: Represents the options used to make up a data entity creation.

fields.description: The set of schema fields that will be provided during the creation. This should always include the primary key fields.

values.description:
One or more data entity specifications, where each specification is an array of values that exactly correspond to
            the Fields collection.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.Update.description: Represents the options used to make up an update.

updateColumns.description: An array specifying the fields to update (and their values).

filter.description: A filter used to narrow the update results.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.UpdateResu.description: Represents the result of an update.

rowsUpdated.description: The number of rows affected by the update.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.Delete.description: Represents the options used to make up a data entity deletion.

deleteColumns.description:
A collection of arrays (one for each data entity being deleted) which contains the primary
            key column and value pairs for the data entity to delete.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.DeleteResu.description: Represents the result of an update.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.NewComment.description: The model representing a new comment to be added.

comment.description: The comment text to be added

entityIdentifier.description:
The unique identifier of the entity (flight, event, etc.) that the comment is associated with.
            This is an array since some entity types have compound primary keys (multiple fields).
            These should be primary key values on the entity's database and should be in order. These should 
            uniquely identify a single entity

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.TrackedQue.description: Represents the information needed to roll back a specific tracked query.

queryName.description: A unique name that represents the tracked query that should be rolled back

batchId.description: A unique id (guid) which represents the specific query instance that should be rolled back

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Schema.QueryTrans.description:
Represents the input information for performing a query transformation
            (e.g. applying automatic filtering).

type.description: The type of transformation to apply

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.EmsProfile.Profil.description: Encapsulates all the profile results for a flight.

profileVersion.description:
The numeric version of the profile that was processed to generate the results. This
            corresponds to an index in the array of version history entries for the profile

parameterFiltering.description: Whether automatic parameter filtering was enabled when the profile was processed

events.description: The events detected in the flight

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.EmsProfile.Profil.description: Encapsulates information about a profile results value (measurement or timepoint).

itemId.description: The id of the item in the profile.

dataValue.description: The computed data value for the given item

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.EmsProfile.Profil.description: Encapsulates information about an event result stored in the database.

recordNumber.description: The unique id of the event in the database

eventType.description: The unique id of the event definition that generated this event

phaseOfFlight.description: The phase of flight where the event occurred (a value from the EMS POF list)

severity.description: The event severity (a value from the EMS Severity list)

status.description:
The status of the event (a value from the EMS Status list). Typically this is defaulted to
            0 for new events, but in some data-merge scenarios we need to import a non-default value
            from a remote system

falsePositive.description:
The false positive value for the event (a value from the EMS False Positive list).
            Typically this is defaulted to 0 for new events, but in some data-merge scenarios we
            need to import a non-default value from a remote system

startTime.description:
The starting offset for the event.
            This can be null for computed events where the timepoint or interval aren't set or don't resolve

endTime.description:
The ending offset for the event.
            This can be null for computed events where the timepoint or interval aren't set or don't resolve

globalMeasurements.description: The global event measurements (defined for all events)

globalTimepoints.description: The global event timepoints (defined for all events)

localMeasurements.description: The event-specific measurements (different for each event type)

localTimepoints.description: The event-specific timepoints (different for each event type)

comments.description:
The event comments. Usually this is empty, but it's required for some data-merge
            scenarios.

user.description: The user that wrote the comment

date.description: The date and time that the comment was added (UTC)

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.EmsProfile.EmsPro.description: Represents an APM (Automated Parameter Measurement) profile in an EMS system.

profileId.description: The local identifier for a profile

profileGuid.description: The unique identifier of a profile in the system

library.description: Flag for if a profile is a library profile

glossaryVersion.description: The version of the EMS glossary the results were generated from.

profileId.description: The local identifier of the profile

profileGuid.description: The unique GUID of the profile in the system

currentVersion.description: The version of the associated profile

currentVersionGuid.description: The GUID identifier for the version of this profile.

glossaryItems.description: Array of entries in this glossary.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.EmsProfile.Glossa.description: Represents a single entry for an item in a profile glossary.

recordType.description: A character representing a profile glossary entries record type.

scope.description: A character representing the scope of this entry.

itemId.description: A unique integer id for this item.

eventTypeId.description: The event type id of this item. This is only available for valid event types.

dataType.description: A character representing the data type of this entry.

logicalId.description: A GUID defining this item's logical id.

name.description: The name provided for this item.

units.description: An optional unit provided for this item.

firstAssociatedItemType.description: The item type of the first associated item.

firstAssociatedItemScope.description: The scope of the first associated item.

firstAssociatedItemId.description: The item id of the first associated item.

secondAssociatedItemType.description: The item type of the second associated item.

secondAssociatedItemScope.description: The scope of the second associated item.

secondAssociatedItemId.description: The item id of the second associated item.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.EmsSecurable.EmsS.description: A container for securables and other containers.

name.description: The name of this container

containers.description: The child containers of this container

securables.description: The securable items in this container

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.EmsSecurable.EmsS.description: Represents a securable item within the EMS environment.

id.description: The identifier for this securable

name.description: The name of this securable

concreteType.description: The type for this securable. The type determines which access rights are applicable to the securable

supportedRights.description: The access rights for this securable

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.EmsSecurable.EmsS.description: An access right that can be applied to a securable.

name.description: The name of the access right

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.ExportService.Ana.description: Represents the options used to make up an analytic export service.

name.description: The (display) name of the export service

description.description: An optional description for the export service

databaseId.description: The identifier of the database on which the anlytics are based.

exportType.description: The type of export to produce (e.g. text-based CSV, Parquet, etc.)

select.description:
An array specifying the analytics (e.g. parameters) to be included in the export
            Use null or an empty array to return only offset values

offsetType.description: This defines the way in which the offsets are determined

start.description:
The optional analytic identifier representing the start offset in the data, in seconds from the start of the data. 
            If not specified, the beginning of the available data is used

end.description:
The optional analytic identifier representing the end offset in the data, in seconds from the start of the data. 
            If not specified, the end of the available data is used

unsampledDataMode.description:
This determines how to treat data values for offsets that are not sampled. If left unset this defaults to 'leaveBlank'.
            This only applies when performing queries using an "OffsetType" other than sampled values

unsampledValue.description:
This optional parameter replaces any unsampled (blank) values with a constant value. This defaults to a null value.
            This only applies for TextCsv exports - specifically when performing exports using an "OffsetType" other than sampled values

doesNotExistValue.description:
This optional parameter replaces any values that come back as DNE (does not exist) with a constant value. This defaults to "DNE".
            This only applies for TextCsv exports - specifically when performing queries using an "OffsetType" other than sampled values

filtering.description: The filtering used to narrow down the set of entities (e.g. flights) that should be exported

azureBlobContainer.description:
The name of the Azure blob container where the export blob output will be written
            (see AzureBlobName property for the name of the blob).
            NOTE: This container must already exist in order for the export to complete successfully

azureBlobPath.description: An analytic identifer that defines the path (relative to the blob container) of the export blob output

azureBlobConnectionString.description: The connection string to the Azure blob store where the export output will be written

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.ExportService.Ser.description: Represents information about an export service.

id.description: The unique identifier of the service

name.description: The (display) name of the service

databaseId.description: The database identifier associated with this export

enabled.description: Whether the service is currently enabled

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.ExportService.Ser.description: Contains status/count information for an export service.

id.description: The unique identifier of the export service to which this status information belongs

enabled.description: Whether the service is currently enabled

exportsWaiting.description: The count of exports waiting to be processed

exportsPending.description: The count of exports currently processing

exportsProcessed.description: The count of exports successfully processed

exportsFailed.description: The count of exports that failed processing

lastDispatchedTime.description: The last time that an export job was dispatched for processing

lastSuccessfulTime.description: The last time an export completed successfully

lastUnsuccessfulTime.description: The last time an export failed to process

estimatedCompletionTime.description: The estimated completion time for all waiting exports

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Identification.Id.description: Represents the identification information for a flight.

creationTime.description: The creation time of the identification record

fleet.description: The fleet name that this flight is associated with

aircraftId.description: The aircraft identifier. This could be the tail number or some other identifier

aircraftVersion.description: The aircraft version. This could be nose number or some other value

dafifRelease.description: The DAFIF release associated with this flight

airportTakeoff.description: The takeoff airport for the flight

airportLanding.description: The landing airport for the flight

airportTakeoffAtTakeoff.description: The takeoff airport recorded at takeoff of the flight

airportTakeoffAtMidpoint.description: The takeoff airport recorded at the midpoint of the flight

airportTakeoffAtTouchdown.description: The takeoff airport recorded at touchdown of the flight

airportLandingAtTakeoff.description: The landing airport recorded at takeoff of the flight

airportLandingAtMidpoint.description: The landing airport recorded at the midpoint of the flight

airportLandingAtTouchdown.description: The landing airport recorded at touchdown of the flight

latitudeAtTakeoff.description: The latitude recorded at takeoff of the flight

latitudeAtMidpoint.description: The latitude recorded at the midpoint of the flight

latitudeAtTouchdown.description: The latitude recorded at touchdown of the flight

longitudeAtTakeoff.description: The longitude recorded at takeoff of the flight

longitudeAtMidpoint.description: The longitude recorded at midpoint of the flight

longitudeAtTouchdown.description: The longitude recorded at touchdown of the flight

gmtAtTakeoff.description: The GMT recorded at takeoff of the flight

gmtAtMidpoint.description: The GMT recorded at the midpoint of the flight

gmtAtTouchdown.description: The GMT recorded at touchdown of the flight

dayAtTakeoff.description: The day recorded at takeoff of the flight

dayAtMidpoint.description: The day recorded at the midpoint of the flight

dayAtTouchdown.description: The day recorded at touchdown of the flight

monthAtTakeoff.description: The month recorded at takeoff of the flight

monthAtMidpoint.description: The month recorded at midpoint of the flight

monthAtTouchdown.description: The month recorded at touchdown of the flight

yearAtTakeoff.description: The year recorded at takeoff of the flight

yearAtMidpoint.description: The year recorded at midpoint of the flight

yearAtTouchdown.description: The year recorded at touchdown of the flight

dateAtTakeoff.description: The date recorded at takeoff of the flight

dateAtMidpoint.description: The date recorded at the midpoint of the flight

dateAtTouchdown.description: The date recorded at touchdown of the flight

flightNumAtTakeoff.description: The flight number processed at takeoff of the flight

flightNumAtMidpoint.description: The flight number processed at the midpoint of the flight

flightNumAtTouchdown.description: The flight number processed at touchdown of the flight

flightNum1AtTakeoff.description: The flight number recorded at takeoff of the flight

flightNum1AtMidpoint.description: The flight number recorded at the midpoint of the flight

flightNum1AtTouchdown.description: The flight number recorded at touchdown of the flight

flightNum2AtTakeoff.description: The secondary flight recorded at takeoff of the flight

flightNum2AtMidpoint.description: The secondary flight recorded at the midpoint of the flight

flightNum2AtTouchdown.description: The secondary flight number recorded at touchdown of the flight

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Identification.Id.description: Represents an identifying property of a flight.

name.description: The name of the field

value.description: The value of the field for a specific flight

id.description: The unique identifier for this airport

name.description: The name of the airport

ataCode.description: The ATA (FAA) code is the US-specific 3-letter identifier (e.g. ORD)

emsCode.description: The airport code as it should be displayed by EMS apps

icaoCode.description: The ICAO code is the international 4-letter identifier (e.g. KORD)

magneticVariation.description: The magnetic variation of the airport

type.description: The type of airport (e.g. civil, military)

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Navigation.Naviga.description: Various pieces of information associated with a runway.

id.description: The unique identifier for the runway

airportId.description: The unique identifier of the airport for this runway

string.description: A text value associated with the runway

oppositeId.description: The dafif id of the reciprocal runway (i.e. landing in the opposite direction on this runway)

headingTrue.description: The true heading of the runway

headingMagnetic.description: The magnetic heading of the runway

takeoffDistance.description: The takeoff distance of the runway

landingDistance.description: The landing distance of the runway

thresholdDisplaced.description: The threshold displaced value associated with the runway

thresholdLatitude.description: The threshold latitude value associated with the runway

thresholdLongitude.description: The threshold longitude value associated with the runway

thresholdElevation.description: The threshold elevation value associated with the runway

thresholdCrossHeight.description: The threshold crossheight value associated with the runway

thresholdToGlideslopeDistance.description: The threshold to glideslope distance associated with the runway

lighting.description: Bitflags indicating the available lighting for the runway

glideslopeAngle.description: The glideslope angle value associated with the runway

glideslopeLatitude.description: The glideslope latitude value associated with the runway

glideslopeLongitude.description: The glideslope longitude value associated with the runway

glideslopeAltitude.description: The glideslope altitude value associated with the runway

localizerWidth.description: The localizer width value associated with the runway

localizerNavaid.description: The navaid id of the localizer navaid

localizerFrequency.description: The localizer frequency value associated with the runway

backcourseLocalizerFrequency.description: The backcourse localizer frequency value associated with the runway

ilsBearingCourse.description: The magnetic heading to fly the ILS

dmeNavaid.description: The navid id of the localizer dme

dmeBias.description: The DME bias for the runway (the distance in NM from the DME to the landing threshold)

innerMarkerLatitude.description: The inner marker latitude value associated with the runway

innerMarkerLongitude.description: The inner marker longitude value associated with the runway

innerMarkerAltitude.description: The inner marker altitude value associated with the runway

middleMarkerNavaid.description: The navaid id of the middle marker, if any

middleMarkerLatitude.description: The middle marker latitude value associated with the runway

middleMarkerLongitude.description: The middle marker longitude value associated with the runway

middleMarkerAltitude.description: The middle marker altitude value associated with the runway

outerMarkerNavaid.description: The navaid id of the outer marker, if any

outerMarkerLatitude.description: The outer marker latitude value associated with the runway

outerMarkerLongitude.description: The outer marker longitude value associated with the runway

outerMarkerAltitude.description: The outer marker altitude value associated with the runway

locatorNavaid.description: The navaid id of the compass locator, if any

locatorLatitude.description: The locator latitude value associated with the runway

locatorLongitude.description: The locator longitude value associated with the runway

locatorAltitude.description: The locator altitude value associated with the runway

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Navigation.Naviga.description: Various pieces of information associated with a procedure.

id.description: The unique identifier for this procedure

displayName.description:
The String description formatted for display purposes.
            This should match what's displayed in the Approach Viewer

cycleDate.description: A text value representing the cycle date of the procedure

emergencySafeAltitude.description: The emergency safe altitude of the procedure

string.description: A text identifier of the procedure

transitionalAltitude.description: The transition altitude of the procedure

transitionalLevel.description: The transition level of the procedure

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Navigation.Naviga.description: Various pieces of information associated with a procedure segment.

id.description: The id of the segment

waypointDescCodes.description: The procedure segment waypoint description codes

navaids.description: The navaids referenced by this segment

isIAF.description: Flag that lets us know if the segment is IAF or not

nextSegmentId.description:
The id of the next segment, this is needed to get the correct
            order of segments

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Navigation.Naviga.description: A single navaid associated with a procedure segment.

navaidId.description: The ID of the navaid referenced by this segment

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Navigation.Naviga.description: Various pieces of information associated with a waypoint.

id.description: The unique identifier of the waypoint

airportId.description: The airport id for the waypoint, if any

countryCode.description: The country code of the waypoint

name.description: The name of the waypoint

icaoCode.description: The ICAO code of the waypoint

usageCode.description: The usage code of the waypoint

magneticVariance.description: The magnetic variance from true north at the waypoint

navaidId.description: The id of the associated navaid, if any

colocationFlag.description: Flag indicating whether or not the waypoint is colocated with the navaid

navaidBearing.description: The magnetic bearing from the navaid to the waypoint

navaidDistance.description: The distance from the navaid to the waypoint

dafifId.description: The DAFIF text identifier of the waypoint

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Navigation.Naviga.description: Various pieces of information associated with a waypoint.

id.description: The unique identifier of the navaid

callsign.description: The radio callsign of the navaid

name.description: The official name of the navaid

frequency.description: The radio frequency of the navaid

usageCode.description: The airspace structure in which the navaid is utilized (e.g. high, low, terminal, etc.)

radioClassCode.description: The radio class code of the navaid (e.g. low-power NDB, high-power NDB, etc)

range.description: The effective range of the navaid in nautical miles

magneticVariance.description: The magnetic varation from true north at the navaid

dmeLatitude.description: The latitude of the DME equipment colocated with the navaid, if any

dmeLongitude.description: The longitude of the DME equipment colocated with the navaid, if any

dmeElevation.description: The elevation of the DME equipment colocated with the navaid, if any

associatedAirport.description: The airport code of the associated airport, if any

status.description: The status of the navaid (e.g. in service, out of service, etc.)

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Navigation.Naviga.description: Navigation procedures for a specific flight.

detectedApproachId.description:
The approach procedure identifier that was detected for the flight.
            This defaults to 0 which represents unknown

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Navigation.GoArou.description:
Procedures for any go arounds.
            This is not currently supported.

procedures.description: Any procedures that occurred for the go around

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Navigation.Naviga.description: A {Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Navigation.NavigationProcedure} with some more data. Specifically this nests subtypes, like segments, rather than just including id references.

id.description: The unique identifier for this procedure

displayName.description:
The Name formatted for display purposes.
            This should match what's displayed in the Approach Viewer

cycleDate.description: A text value representing the cycle date of the procedure

emergencySafeAltitude.description: The emergency safe altitude of the procedure

name.description: A text identifier of the procedure

transitionalAltitude.description: The transition altitude of the procedure

transitionalLevel.description: The transition level of the procedure

segments.description: The segments associated with this procedure

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Navigation.Naviga.description: A {Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Navigation.NavigationProcedureSegment} with some more data. Specifically this nests subtypes, like waypoints, rather than just using id references.

id.description: The id of the segment

waypointDescCodes.description: The procedure segment waypoint description codes

navaids.description: The navaids referenced by this segment

isIAF.description: Flag that lets us know if the segment is IAF or not

nextSegmentId.description:
The id of the next segment, this is needed to get the correct
            order of segments

name.description: The name of the group.

groupId.description: The id of the group. This should be a relative path.

groups.description: An array of groups contained by this group.

sets.description: An array of parameter sets contained by this group.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.ParameterSet.Para.description: Encapsulates the some data defining a ParameterSet.

name.description: The name of the ParameterSet.

description.description: An optional description of the ParameterSet.

items.description: An array of the parameters contained in the ParameterSet.

chartIndex.description: The index of the chart that this analytic info belongs to, or null if no index specified.

parameter.description: The analytic that is represented by this parameter set item.

customName.description: The custom name the user specified for the item, or null if not-specified.

color.description: The color to use for the line in hexadecimal color specification "#RRGGBB", or null if no color specified.

customRange.description: Optional override for the vertical scale for a parameter.

customDigitsAfterDecimal.description: Optional override for the number of digits to display.

lineWidth.description: Optional value from 1 to 5 for the width of the line.

displaySampleMarker.description: Optional value specifying whether the parameter should display shapes to indicate the sampled values.

sampleMarkerShape.description:
If set, describes the shape to use for the sampled values.
            Possible values: [Square, Circle, Triangle, InvertedTriangle, Cross, Star]

lineStyle.description:
If set, describes the line style to use when drawing.
            Possible values: [Dash, Dot, DashDot, DashDotDot, Solid]

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Profile.ProfileRe.description: Encapsulates all the profile results for a flight.

profileVersion.description:
The integer version of the profile that was processed to generate the results,
            corresponding to an index in the array of version history entries for the profile

parameterFiltering.description: Indicates whether automatic parameter filtering was enabled when the profile was processed

events.description: The event results detected in the flight

processingInformation.description: The processing information of the flight

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Profile.ProfileRe.description: Encapsulates information about a profile results value (measurement or timepoint).

itemId.description: The integer ID of the result value in the profile

dataValue.description: The computed data value for the result

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Profile.ProfileRe.description: Encapsulates information about an event result stored in the database.

recordNumber.description: The unique integer ID of the event in the database

eventType.description: The unique ID of the event definition that generated the event

phaseOfFlight.description: The phase of flight where the event occurred (which is a value from the EMS phase of flight list)

severity.description: The event severity (which is a value from the EMS severity list)

status.description:
The status of the event (which is a value from the EMS status list). Typically this defaults to
            0 for new events, but in some data-merge scenarios we need to import a non-default value
            from a remote system

falsePositive.description:
The false positive value for the event (a value from the EMS false positive list).
            Typically this defaults to 0 for new events, but in some data-merge scenarios we
            need to import a non-default value from a remote system

startTime.description:
The start offset for the event.
            This can be null for computed events where the timepoint or interval aren't set or don't resolve

endTime.description:
The end offset for the event.
            This can be null for computed events where the timepoint or interval aren't set or don't resolve

globalMeasurements.description: The global event measurement results (defined for all events)

globalTimepoints.description: The global event timepoint results (defined for all events)

localMeasurements.description: The event-specific measurement results (different for each event type)

localTimepoints.description: The event-specific timepoint results (different for each event type)

comments.description:
The event comments. Usually this is empty, but it's required for some data-merge
            scenarios.

processedDate.description: The date and time that the processing occurred (UTC).

workerCpuTime.description: The worker cpu time of the processing in seconds.

workerWallTime.description: The worker wall time of the processing in seconds.

totalWallTime.description: The total wall time of the processing in seconds.

user.description: The user associated with the comment

date.description: The date and time the comment was added (UTC)

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Profile.ProfileGr.description: Represents a folder in the profile tree of an EMS installation.

id.description: The globally unique ID for the profile group

name.description: The display name of the profile group

description.description: The optional description that briefly describes the profile group

groups.description: An ordered listing of child profile groups contained in this group

profiles.description: An ordered listing of child profiles contained in this group

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Profile.Profile.description: Represents an APM (Automated Parameter Measurement) profile in an EMS system.

localId.description: The local integer identifier for the profile

id.description: The globally unique identifier of the profile

name.description: The display name of the profile

treeLocation.description:
The current location of this profile in the tree as a root-first
            array of profile groups (only IDs and Names will be filled out)

library.description: Indicates whether the profile is a "library" profile

currentVersion.description: The current integer version of the profile

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Profile.ProfileGl.description: A glossary for a specific profile. This describes the type of items found in a profile.

glossaryVersion.description: The integer version of the glossary

profileLocalId.description: The local integer identifier of the associated profile

profileId.description: The globally unique identifier of the associated profile

currentVersion.description: The integer version of the associated profile

currentVersionGuid.description: The globally unique identifier for the version of the associated profile

glossaryItems.description: A list of all entries contained in the glossary

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Profile.GlossaryI.description: Represents a single entry for an item in a profile glossary.

recordType.description: A value representing a profile glossary entries record type

scope.description: A value representing the scope of the item

itemId.description: A unique integer ID for the item

eventTypeId.description: The event type ID of the item - this is only available for valid event types

dataType.description: A value representing the data type of the entry

logicalId.description: A unique ID defining the item's logical ID

name.description: The display name of the item

units.description: An optional unit describing how the type of data represented by the item

firstAssociatedItemType.description: The item type of the first associated item

firstAssociatedItemScope.description: The scope of the first associated item

firstAssociatedItemId.description: The item id of the first associated item

secondAssociatedItemType.description: The item type of the second associated item

secondAssociatedItemScope.description: The scope of the second associated item

secondAssociatedItemId.description: The item id of the second associated item

isSavedToDatabase.description: A flag describing if a measurement is saved to the database

id.description: The definition ID of this event

name.description: The name of the event

parameterSet.description: The parameter set associated with the event if any

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Model.Tableau.Trusted.description: Represents information that can be used to access Tableau content related to an associated Tableau server.

trustedUrl.description: The URL that can be used to start a trusted session with the Tableau server.

url.description: The root URL of the Tableau server with site.

site.description: The site that the TrustedUrl is able to access when used.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Model.Tableau.Tableau.description: Represents information about the associated Tableau server.

url.description: The root URL of the Tableau server with site.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.TrajectoryValueAr.description: Encapsulates the data returned when requesting trajectory values through the API.

values.description: The points in the generated trajectory.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.TrajectoryValue.description:
Encapsulates a data point defining the positional information [lat/long/alt] 
            for a sample and the location it occurred at, in seconds from start of file.

offset.description: The offset of the value, in seconds from start of file.

latitude.description: The latitude related to the offset at {Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.TrajectoryValue.Offset}.

longitude.description: The longitude related to the offset at {Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.TrajectoryValue.Offset}.

altitude.description: The altitude related to the offset at {Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.TrajectoryValue.Offset}.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.TrajectoryConfigu.description: Encapsulates a data point defining the userOptions config for a Google Earth export.

trajectoryId.description:
A unique identifier for this type of KML trajectory. 
            Typically this just the name of the file sans extension.

description.description: A description of what kind of trajectory this KML type generates.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Upload.UploadRequ.description: Encapsulates information that will be returned when beginning a new data ingestion transfer.

name.description:
The name of the transfer; this is not necessarily unique, and is just what the user passed 
            when they initiated the transfer.

type.description:
The type of the upload; this is the handler that we will use to process the uploaded data.
            The format of the data will be determined by what this upload type is.

password.description:
The password the data is encrypted with, if any. This point of the encryption possibility
            is that this may be part of a store-and-forward system that stores the data encrypted locally.
            (Thus passing it here along with the data is not particularly a security issue, but rather
            a way to avoid having to decrypt it as it transfers.)
            Note: This is not currently supported with any of the UploadTypes but may be in the future.

totalSize.description:
The total size of the data to be transferred. This may be absent in the case where the upload
            is being streamed and the total size is unknown. If provided this allows you to skip making a
            Finish call to the API to explicitly finish the transfer. Instead a Finish will be inferred
            when sufficient bytes have been sent.

metadata.description:
Arbitrary metadata attached to the transfer record. This may be used by post-processing later
            or for other uses. If this is one of the EMS Collection UploadTypes then this information will
            be added to the generated ident.xml.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Upload.UploadPara.description:
Passed back to the client when a multi-part upload is started. This contains further
            instructions on how to proceed with the upload, including the transfer ID to pass to
            future calls, as well as any change of URL for the actual chunk uploads.

transferId.description: The ID of the transfer; this will be used when making subsequent calls to the upload APIs

url.description:
The URL for the transfer; data block transfers regarding this upload should go to this URL.
            This may also be an empty string, in which case you should keep using the normal URLs

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Upload.UploadResu.description: Summarizes the result of an upload operation.

transferSuccessful.description:
If this is true, the transfer was successful and also the transferred data are intact.
            This includes things like verifying the integrity of zip archives, for the overall transfer
            completion

message.description:
If there was an error, then the error message will describe it. In the case of success, there
            may also be a message here. This message will be suitable for display to a user

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Upload.UploadStat.description: This is sent as a response to an upload transfer status request.

currentCount.description: The current number of bytes the server has received on this transfer.

message.description: Contains a user-readable message about the status of the transfer.

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Upload.UploadReco.description: Represents one record in the list of uploads that we know about on the server side.

id.description: The transfer ID of the transfer, set by the server when the transfer started

name.description: Name field set by the client when the transfer started

currentCount.description: The current number of bytes transferred

totalSize.description: The total size of the transfer, if known

lastTransfer.description:
The timestamp of the last time someone uploaded bytes to this transfer. This will
            be used to determine when a transfer can be aborted automatically

lastProcessing.description:
The timestamp of the last time someone tried to process this transfer. This will
            be used to determine when a transfer can be aborted automatically

startTime.description: The start time of the transfer, from when the initial start request is made

transferFinishTime.description: The finish time of the actual data transfer portion of the process

processingFinishTime.description: The finish time of the processing portion of the process

state.description: The state of the upload, up to and including EMS hand-off

metadata.description:
Metadata for the upload; this is somewhat arbitrary and specific to the type
            of the transfer, but in any event, it will be a JSON blob with key/value pairs

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Upload.UploadProc.description: Represents the status of an upload processing through EMS.

downloadRecord.description: The upload's download record, if known

downloadState.description:
A description of the download record's processing state. This should be checked before assuming
            that the download is correct and complete

flights.description: The upload's flight information, if known

errorMessage.description: Any error message associated with the processing of the upload, if any

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Upload.UploadProc.description: A single flight result within a larger download result.

flightRecord.description: The flight record for the flight

flightStatus.description:
A description of the flight record's processing state. This should be checked before assuming
            that the flight is correct and complete

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Upload.Bucket.description: The name and description of an upload bucket.

name.description: The name of the bucket. This is unique

description.description: Description of the bucket

associatedEmsSystem.description:
The EmsSystem that this bucket is associated with. This is used for determining 
            the EMS Processing status when using the processing status API

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Weather.Taf.TafPa.description: Specifies options to use when calling the TAF parse API.

taf.description: The raw TAF string to parse

issueDate.description:
Date information (in ISO 8601 format) the TAF was issued, since the TAF format doesn't include this 
            information

parseErrors.description: Error messages delimited by newlines if there were non-critical issues parsing the raw TAF string

issued.description: The time point that this TAF report was issued

airport.description: The airport that issued the TAF report

validFrom.description: The starting time point that this TAF report is valid

validTo.description: The ending time point that this TAF report is valid

predictions.description: A list of forecast predictions in the TAF

headerText.description: The header text for the TAF

flightMatchType.description: The time and place relative to a specific flight that this forecast data would match to

matchedPrediction.description: The forecast data that matches to a specific flight

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Weather.Taf.Predi.description: Represents a forecast prediction originally included in a TAF.

id.description: The ID used to uniquely identify this prediction on an EMS system

timeFrom.description: The predicted start time for the weather in this prediction

timeTo.description:
The predicted end time for the weather in this prediction. This is defined by the following predictions start time
            or if it's the last prediction in a TAF it is the end of the validity window

timeBecoming.description:
The time that the prediction weather is expected to occur. This is only used with the "Becoming" change 
            indicator

weatherChange.description:
The type of conditions change indicator specified. When weather conditions are reported as changing this
            is "None"

probability.description: The probability of the weather described in this prediction occurring

windDirection.description: The wind direction in degrees or, if wind is variable this will be zero

windGustSpeed.description: The wind gust speed in knots, if wind gust data is present

windShearHeight.description: The wind shear height in feet, if wind shear data is present

windShearDirection.description: The wind shear direction in degrees, if wind shear data is present

windShearSpeed.description: The wind shear speed in knots, if wind shear data is present

visibilityHorizontal.description: The horizontal visibility in statute miles. Uses "Infinity" to indicate there is no limit

visibilityVertical.description: The vertical visibility in feet above ground level

pressure.description: Pressure above ground level in inches of mercury

portionNotDecoded.description: Any parts of the raw prediction string that were unable to be decoded

ceiling.description:
The lowest altitude of "Broken" or "Overcast" cloud conditions or vertical visibility. Uses "Infinity" to 
            indicate there is no limit

cloudConditions.description: A list of cloud conditions occurring during the prediction

icingConditions.description: A list of icing conditions occurring during the prediction

turbulenceConditions.description: A list of turbulence conditions occurring during the prediction

temperatures.description: A list of temperature conditions occurring during the prediction

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Weather.CloudCond.description: Describes the condition of clouds in the sky.

cloudBase.description:
Specifies the height of the base of a visual portion of a cloud. Uses "Infinity" to designate there is no 
            limit

cloudType.description: Describes the types of clouds appearing in the sky

cloudCoverage.description: Describes the type of cloud cover appearing in the sky

intensity.description:
The intensity code associated with the icing. Uses the following values: 
            0 - Trace icing or none, 
            1 - Light mixed icing, 
            2 - Light rime icing in cloud, 
            3 - Light clear icing in precipitation, 
            4 - Moderate mixed icing, 
            5 - Moderate rime icing in cloud, 
            6 - Moderate clear icing in precipitation, 
            7 - Severe mixed icing, 
            8 - Severe rime icing in cloud, 
            9 - Severe clear icing in precipitation

minimum.description: The base limit of the icing layer in feet

maximum.description: The top limit of the icing layer in feet

intensity.description:
The intensity code associated with the turbulence. Uses the following values: 
            0 - None, 
            1 - Light turbulence, 
            2 - Moderate turbulence in clear air (occasional),
            3 - Moderate turbulence in clear air (frequent),
            4 - Moderate turbulence in cloud (occasional), 
            5 - Moderate turbulence in cloud (frequent),
            6 - Severe turbulence in clear air (occasional),
            7 - Severe turbulence in clear air (frequent),
            8 - Severe turbulence in cloud (occasional),
            9 - Severe turbulence in cloud (frequent)

minimum.description: The base limit of the turbulence layer in feet

maximum.description: The top limit of the turbulence layer in feet

validTime.description: Describes the time at which the temperature forecast is valid

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Weather.Metar.Met.description: Specifies options to use when calling the METAR parse API.

metar.description: The raw METAR string to parse

issueDate.description:
Optional date information (in ISO 8601 format) the METAR was issued, since the METAR format only includes
            day, hour and minute time information.

unparsed.description: The unparsed but de-identified METAR string

airport.description: The airport that issued the METAR report

issued.description:
The day, hour and minute the METAR was issued. May also optionally contain the month and year issued if the
            date contextual information is available

isAutomatic.description: Indicates whether the original METAR data was automatically generated

windDirection.description: The wind direction in degrees or, if wind is variable this will be zero

windGustSpeed.description: The wind gust speed in knots, if wind gust data is present

windDirectionVariableStart.description: When wind is variable, the approximate end range of the wind direction in degrees

windDirectionVariableEnd.description: When wind is variable, the approximate end range of the wind direction in degrees

effectiveVisibility.description: The effective visibility in statute miles

exactVisibility.description: The exact reported visibility in statute miles. Uses "Infinity" to indicate there is no limit

visibilityQualifier.description: A qualifier describing the current exact reported visibility

runwayVisualRanges.description: A list of runway visual ranges for reported runways

currentWeather.description: A list of current weather phenomenons

recentWeather.description: A list of recently occurring weather phenomenons

isWeatherDataValid.description: Indicates whether all current/recent reported weather phenomenons had valid sensor data

cloudConditions.description: A list of current cloud conditions

ceiling.description: The lowest "Broken", "Overcast" or "Vertical Visibility" cloud conditions associated with this object

isCloudDataValid.description: Indicates whether all reported cloud conditions had valid sensor data

maxCloudHeight.description:
The maximum height of the base of a visual portion of one of the cloud conditions associated with this 
            object. Uses "Infinity" to indicate there is no limit

temperature.description: The current temperature value in degrees Celsius

dewpoint.description: The current dew point value in degrees Celsius

pressure.description: Pressure above ground level in inches of mercury

runwayConditions.description: A list of current runway conditions

flightMatchType.description: The time and place relative to a specific flight that this METAR data would match to

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Weather.Metar.Run.description:
Describes the current 10-minute average visual range for a runway, which is the distance over which a pilot
            can see the runway surface markings.

runway.description: The name/number/approach direction identifying the runway

visibilityPrimary.description:
The primary runway visibility distance in feet. If a variable range is set, this value describes the 
            minimum visibility distance in a visual range

visibilityPrimaryQualifier.description: A qualifier describing the primary visibility distance

visibilityVariable.description:
The variable runway visibility distance in feet, describing the maximum visibility distance in the 
            visual range

visibilityVariableQualifier.description: A qualifier describing the variable visibility distance

trend.description: The trend of the runway visibility distance

unparsed.description: The original, unparsed weather phenomenon string

intensity.description: Describes the intensity of the whether phenomenon

qualifier.description: A qualifier for any weather precipitation

precipitation.description: The type of precipitation that this phenomenon represents

precipitationSecondary.description:
The secondary type of precipitation that can be optionally specified to more accurately describe the 
            precipitation

obscuration.description: Any weather that can obscure vision

other.description: Other weather cases that do not fall under precipitation

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Weather.Metar.Run.description: Describes the condition of a runway.

unparsed.description: The original, unparsed runway conditions string

runway.description: The name/number/approach direction identifying the runway

depositType.description: The type of deposits currently on the runway

coverage.description: The coverage of deposits currently on the runway

depth.description: Indicates the depth of deposits currently on the runway in centimeters

braking.description: The "braking action" value describing the current braking conditions of the runway

friction.description:
The "coefficient of friction" value that alternatively describes the current braking conditions of the 
            runway

isClear.description: Indicating whether the runway conditions are clear of deposits

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Weather.Taf.TafQu.description: Defines the options that can be used to query for TAF reports.

airportId.description: Optional airport ID for an airport returned by the Assets APIs. If set then ICAO code should not be set

airportIcao.description: Optional airport ICAO code. If set then airportId should not be set

issueRangeFrom.description: Optional date range from filter. If set all TAFs issued after this value will be returned

issueRangeTo.description: Optional date range to filter. If set all TAFs issued before this value will be returned

validRangeFrom.description:
Optional date range from filter. If set any TAF that is valid from this point to validRangeTo
            will be returned. If set validRangeTo must also be set

validRangeTo.description:
Optional date range from filter. If set any TAF that is valid to this point from validRangeFrom
            will be returned. If set validRangeFrom must also be set

validTime.description: Optional single time point for which to return all valid TAFs

visibilityMinimum.description:
Optional value indicating the minimum observed visibility in miles. Since TAFs have multiple visibility values if any one value in the TAF meets 
            this criteria that TAF will be returned

visibilityMaximum.description:
Optional value indicating the maximum observed visibility in miles. Since TAFs have multiple visibility values if any one value in the TAF meets 
            this criteria that TAF will be returned

ceilingMinimum.description:
Optional value indicating the minimum observed ceiling in feet. Since TAFs have multiple visibility values if any one value in the TAF meets 
            this criteria that TAF will be returned

ceilingMaximum.description:
Optional value indicating the maximum observed ceiling in feet. Since TAFs have multiple visibility values if any one value in the TAF meets 
            this criteria that TAF will be returned

maxResults.description: The maximum number of results to return. If set to 0 all results will be returned. This defaults to 200

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Weather.Metar.Met.description: Defines the options that can be used to query for METAR reports.

airportId.description: Optional airport ID for an airport returned by the Assets APIs. If set then ICAO code should not be set

airportIcao.description: Optional airport ICAO code. If set then airportId should not be set

observationRangeFrom.description: Optional date range from filter. If set all METARs issued after this value will be returned

observationRangeTo.description: Optional date range to filter. If set all METARs issued before this value will be returned

visibilityMinimum.description: Optional value indicating the minimum observed visibility in miles

visibilityMaximum.description: Optional value indicating the maximum observed visibility in miles

ceilingMinimum.description: Optional value indicating the minimum observed ceiling in feet

ceilingMaximum.description: Optional value indicating the maximum observed ceiling in feet

maxResults.description: The maximum number of results to return. If set to 0 all results will be returned. This defaults to 200

Adi.Ems.Web.Api.V2.Dto.Weather.WeatherRe.description: Represents TAF and METAR weather reports collected by an EMS system.

tafReports.description: A list of collected TAF reports from an EMS system

metarReports.description: A list of collected METAR reports from an EMS system
